name: The World War Simulator: Part II
overview: The World War Simulator: Part II. In the year 3000, video games are so advanced that people can fulfil virtually any fantasy they desire. In this game you play as Richard Burton as he attempts to infiltrate Hitler's bunker and assassinate him. Not only him, but his mistress Eva Braun, Goebbels and others. To see the best ending in the history of video games you must complete 100% of the trophies.
